code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{supabase}from'../supabaseClient';import LogIn from'../components/LogIn';import SignUp from'../components/SignUp';import{Box,Button,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[showLogin,setShowLogin]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const checkUser=async()=>{const{data:{session}}=await supabase.auth.getSession();if(session){navigate('/dashboard');}};checkUser();},[navigate]);const toggleForm=()=>{setShowLogin(!showLogin);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{height:'100vh',display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',flexDirection:'column',px:2},children:[showLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogIn,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUp,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mt:2},children:showLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Don't have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"text",onClick:toggleForm,sx:{color:'primary.main'},children:"Sign Up"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Already have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"text",onClick:toggleForm,sx:{color:'primary.main'},children:"Log In"})]})})]});}export default Home;
